newsitem.title: UK: NWE gasoline weakens on futures in moribund market.
newsitem.headline: NWE gasoline weakens on futures in moribund market.

text.p: NWE gasoline eased on Tuesday in line with softer futures in lacklustre trade as the market got back into gear following the Easter holiday, traders said.
A Eurograde barge traded at $200 fob Rotterdam, but later traders said buyers were not even prepared to offer $200.
Some noted that any further weakening in price would be short-lived with few players expected to run tight positions ahead of U.S. summer demand.
On the swaps front, April was quoted at $200/$203 fob ARA.
